item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
The Woodworker's Companion

about us

AutoCAD’s Plugin for Flawless Cuts

We are a team based in Colorado with a passion for the wood-cutting process. Inspired by our interest, we embarked on a journey to develop a Fusion 360 plugin that streamlines the cutting process, offering convenience to professionals in the industry. This project marks the culmination of our Senior Experience course in the Spring 2024 semester at Metropolitan State University of Denver.

Overcome your obstacles

Determine Your Purpose

Whether you're a hobbyist or part of an industrial operation, OptiCut caters to your cutting needs.

Bring your ideas to life

Simplify the cutting process and bring your designs to fruition with OptiCut's efficient cutting methods.

Seamless Customization

OptiCut seamlessly integrates with Fusion 360 and boasts a user-friendly interface.

Collaborative Project

OptiCut is an open-source platform, welcoming contributions from the community

Let’s kickstart your experience

We’ll be with you every step of the way.

Download

 Contact us

  • 890 Auraria Pkwy
    Denver, CO 80204
    (303) 556-5740

  • https://github.com/OptiCut/OptiCut

item.title: Classes
item.content:encoded:
Training courses

Do you have ideas but don’t know how to solidify your thoughts together? In this class, we teach you how to piece-meal thoughts together to define what would make a solid business idea.

Business Planning 101

Ideation

Taking the next step in creating a business: your business model. How does your business idea begin and how do you outline your goals and strategic planning from 1 year to 5 years from now.

Concept Investment

Pitching to Investors

Deciding to invest your business on your own? Through this class, we define major finance and money business plans that help you decide which method works best for your business.

Presentation skills, pitching and selling yourself and your brand. Tina & Rose take you through a step-by-step process on conquering your fears and on the right path to owning it.

Kickstarting Your Business

Business Growth 101

Once you have the money, then what? We outline clear defined pathways for you to takeoff your new business adventure.

Need to expand? Hire employees? Open a second location? We define everything you need to consider when growing your business.

Back to Member Portal
